mapper.select: select province as id_province,concat(city,' ',district) as id_city,concat(province,city,district) as id_address,district as id_district from origin_place where id_last_num=#{id_first_num} limit 1
select province as mobile_province,city as mobile_city from tel_area_code where area=#{area} limit 1
select url as imgPath from attach_pic where user_id=#{userId} and type=#{imgType}
